Summary: oval shped, red and yellow lights, and had 3 spikes
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Grand Blanc
There were no other sightings in Grand Blanc on or around November 30th 2002
divs: Sighting Details I was talking with my sister when, I look out the wndow and i see what I think is an airplane, when it starts to hover above our barn. It does that for about thirty seconds to a minute. Then it starts gliding toward us with no noise at all so we go out side to follow it. It seems like it's going to crash in our front lawn and goes right over a tree. It sailed over the trees and my sister and I thought it was going to crash into the lake. It was so close I could see the reflection in the water and I noticed that it was definitly not an airplane. It was oval shaped, had red and yellow lights, had three spikes, and a faint turquis glow at the top of the craft. It is Easter morning that I am writing this and I had the encounter last night.
